meaning_str.bing:
adv. 几乎；将近；差不多
网络. 大约

几乎；差不多；接近；将近；简直；几可；几乎要；差一点；几乎是；密切地；亲密地

1.en: Most of the shavings were concentrated in one area, Tani said, and nearly everything else was covered with a fine dust.
1.cn: 多数钢屑集中在一个区域，而且几乎所有的其他部件都覆盖上了细细的灰尘。

2.en: And I believe, from what I know of him, he was a bit of a rake. We bivouacked together on and off for nearly two years.
2.cn: 另外以我对他的了解，这是个有点浪子气息的家伙，我们偶尔一起出去露营，这种事持续了大概两年。

3.en: It has grown at nearly 10 per cent a year for 30 years, and its economy is now four times the size of India's.
3.cn: 30年来，中国一直以每年近10%的速度发展，目前经济规模是印度的4倍。

0.en: Hurricane Carmen came through here yesterday, destroying nearly everything in its path.
0.cn: 卡门飓风昨天过境，沿途几乎摧毁了一切。

1.en: In Massachusetts, nearly half the homes use gas for heating in addition to electricity.
1.cn: 在马萨诸塞州，几乎一半家庭除了用电，就用天然气来取暖。

2.en: Several million years ago, a gene plague caused by cloning nearly annihilated the entire human race.
2.cn: 几百万年前尤克隆导致的基因灾祸几乎使整个人类都灭绝了。

3.en: That's nearly everything on our list. There's one last thing on the list. A plant? Is that on the list?
3.cn: 清单上的东西几乎都有了。清单上还有一种东西。一棵植物？清单上有吗？

4.en: Very good. That's nearly everything on our list. There's one last thing on the list. A plant? Is that on the list?
4.cn: 非常好，清单上的东西几乎都有了。清单上还有一种东西。一棵植物？清单上有吗？

5.en: Well, you'll be happy to know that if you wash your hands properly with soap, nearly all traces of bacteria will be removed, regardless of how you dry them.
5.cn: 其实无论你怎么擦干手，只要用肥皂洗手，几乎细菌就会一干二净。

6.en: Some 400,000 people lost nearly everything during the dust bowl. One of America's worst man-made ecological disasters.
6.cn: 大约40万人在干旱沙暴期间，几乎失去了一切。美国历史上最严重的一次人为生态灾害。

7.en: Through developing mobile payment, we can now use apps to pay in nearly all the situations, even to make an appointment with the doctors.
7.cn: 通过不断发展的移动支付方式，我们现在能用手机应用软件在几乎任何情境下支付，甚至能预约医生。

8.en: Engineering solutions are required to supply the huge amounts of energy that are needed to reduce pollution that's affecting almost half of its nearly 1.4 billion populations.
8.cn: 各类工程解决方案既要提供大量能源，又要减少污染。这污染几乎影响到了近14亿人口中的一半。

9.en: So, one year later after launching on, nearly every media outlet had proclaimed that my new venture with a flop, not just a flop, but the big bold flop, they call it.
9.cn: 在推出一年之后，几乎所有的媒体都宣布我的新事业失败了，不仅是失败，用他们的话说是“一败涂地”。

10.en: And the city has had to deal with that shortfall. Every driver in L.A. experiences 64 hours of delays on average every year, nearly three entire days spent stuck in traffic.
10.cn: 城市必须面对偷工减料的后果，每个洛杉矶的司机平均每年都要在路上堵个64小时，几乎堵上整整三天啊。

11.en: That's nearly all the tomatoes America processes for foods like pizza sauce, ketchup, and salsad, as well as a third of those consumed by the entire world.
11.cn: 那几乎是整个美国全部的，用来制作披萨酱，番茄酱，沙拉需要的所有番茄，而且其中三分之一还出口到世界的其他地方。

12.en: This is the engineering department of a company that's worth nearly $80 billion, a company that's growing by 100% each year while building a product that no one had even heard of a decade ago, Facebook.
12.cn: 这是一个公司里的工程部，价值几乎达到了800个亿，一个每年以两倍的速度发展的公司，制造一项十几年来闻所未闻的新兴产品，脸书。

13.en: No. That one is not nearly this nice.
13.cn: 不是。那套可没有这套好看。

14.en: For what? Nearly blasting me into space?
14.cn: 谢什么？差点把我轰进太空里吗？

15.en: Nearly 700 million Chinese live in cities now.
15.cn: 现在有大约七亿中国人居住在各个城市中。

16.en: And my sister's not a monster. She nearly killed me.
16.cn: 我姐姐也不是怪物，她差点杀了我。

17.en: Man, you scared me, kid. Ah, I nearly soiled myself.
17.cn: 你吓死我了。小鬼，我差点掉下去了。

18.en: Indeed. Yes, sir. You nearly got Ron and me expelled.
18.cn: 老实说，没错。你差点害我跟荣恩被开除。

19.en: It's nearly gotten you killed all this time. Come here.
19.cn: 每次你都差点儿没命，过来。
